member.name: T:Eduard.Cryptography.ECMath
member.summary: Provides mathematical operations for points on the Weierstrass elliptic curve.

member.name: M:Eduard.Cryptography.ECMath.Add(Eduard.Cryptography.EllipticCurve,Eduard.Cryptography.ECPoint,Eduard.Cryptography.ECPoint)
member.summary: Add two affine points on the Weierstrass elliptic curve.

member.name: M:Eduard.Cryptography.ECMath.Multiply(Eduard.Cryptography.EllipticCurve,Eduard.BigInteger,Eduard.Cryptography.ECPoint,Eduard.Cryptography.ECMode,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Multiply the affine point on the Weierstrass elliptic curve by a specified scalar.

member.name: M:Eduard.Cryptography.ECMath.Negate(Eduard.Cryptography.EllipticCurve,Eduard.Cryptography.ECPoint)
member.summary: Compute the additive inverse of the specified affine point on the Weierstrass curve.

member.name: T:Eduard.Cryptography.ECMode
member.summary: Provides different methods for scalar multiplication of points on an elliptic curve.

member.name: F:Eduard.Cryptography.ECMode.EC_STANDARD_AFFINE
member.summary: Uses the standard affine representation for scalar multiplication of points.

member.name: F:Eduard.Cryptography.ECMode.EC_STANDARD_PROJECTIVE
member.summary: Use the standard mixed projective representation for scalar multiplication of points.

member.name: F:Eduard.Cryptography.ECMode.EC_FASTEST
member.summary: Uses the NAF sliding window algorithm and mixed projective coordinates for point representation.

member.name: F:Eduard.Cryptography.ECMode.EC_SECURE
member.summary: Uses the Montgomery Ladder algorithm for scalar multiplication of mixed projective points to enhance security.

member.name: T:Eduard.Cryptography.ECPoint
member.summary: Represents a point on an elliptic curve in affine coordinates.

member.name: M:Eduard.Cryptography.ECPoint.#ctor
member.summary: Creates an equals with point at infinity.

member.summary: Creates an from the specified affine x-coordinate and affine y-coordinate.

member.name: P:Eduard.Cryptography.ECPoint.POINT_INFINITY
member.summary: This defines the point at infinity.

member.name: M:Eduard.Cryptography.ECPoint.GetAffineX
member.summary: Returns the affine x-coordinate.

member.name: M:Eduard.Cryptography.ECPoint.GetAffineY
member.summary: Returns the affine y-coordinate.

member.name: M:Eduard.Cryptography.ECPoint.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Compares this elliptic curve point for equality with the specified object.

member.name: M:Eduard.Cryptography.ECPoint.op_Equality(Eduard.Cryptography.ECPoint,Eduard.Cryptography.ECPoint)
member.summary: Returns a value that indicates if the affine coordinates of two objects are equal.

member.summary: Returns a value that indicates if the affine coordinates of two objects have different values.

member.name: M:Eduard.Cryptography.ECPoint.GetHashCode
member.summary: Returns a hash code value for this elliptic curve point.

member.name: T:Eduard.Cryptography.ECPointCompressionMode
member.summary: Provides methods to store affine points on the elliptic curve.

member.name: F:Eduard.Cryptography.ECPointCompressionMode.EC_POINT_COMPRESSED
member.summary: Use the compressed form to represent affine points compactly.

member.name: F:Eduard.Cryptography.ECPointCompressionMode.EC_POINT_UNCOMPRESSED
member.summary: Use the uncompressed form for a standardized representation of affine points.

member.name: T:Eduard.Cryptography.EllipticCurve
member.summary: Represents an elliptic curve given in Weierstrass form.

member.summary: Creates a Weierstrass curve with random coefficients.

member.summary: Creates a Weierstrass curve with given coefficients.

member.name: M:Eduard.Cryptography.EllipticCurve.GetPoint(Eduard.BigInteger,System.Int32)
member.summary: Encodes a binary message as an elliptic curve point using Koblitz's compression algorithm.
member.param: Represents a binary message as a large integer.
Number of iterations for Koblitz's algorithm.

member.name: M:Eduard.Cryptography.EllipticCurve.GetMessage(Eduard.Cryptography.ECPoint,System.Int32)
member.summary: Decodes the binary message from its corresponding elliptic curve point.
member.param: Represents the elliptic curve point corresponding to the binary message.
Specifies the number of iterations in Koblitz's algorithm.

member.summary: Get a random base point or set a specified base point on the elliptic curve.

member.name: M:Eduard.Cryptography.EllipticCurve.Sqrt(Eduard.BigInteger,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Computes the modular square root of an integer over the prime field.

member.summary: Creates a representing the point at infinity.

member.summary: Creates a from the specified projective coordinates X, Y, T, and Z.

member.name: P:Eduard.Cryptography.ExtendedProjectivePoint.POINT_INFINITY
member.summary: Represents the elliptic curve point at infinity.

member.summary: Determines whether the projective coordinates of two objects are equal.

member.summary: Determines whether the projective coordinates of two objects differ.

member.summary: Returns the hash code of this extended projective elliptic curve point.

member.summary: Compares an extended projective point with a specified object for equality.

member.name: T:Eduard.Cryptography.Extensions.ECPointExtensions
member.summary: This class is a utility for converting projective points to affine form and vice versa.

member.name: M:Eduard.Cryptography.Extensions.ECPointExtensions.ToAffine(Eduard.Cryptography.EllipticCurve,Eduard.Cryptography.JacobianPoint)
member.summary: Convert a given point in Jacobian projective form to an affine point on the elliptic curve.

member.name: M:Eduard.Cryptography.Extensions.ECPointExtensions.ToAffine(Eduard.Cryptography.TwistedEdwardsCurve,Eduard.Cryptography.ExtendedProjectivePoint)
member.summary: Convert an extended projective point to an affine point on the twisted Edwards curve.

member.name: M:Eduard.Cryptography.Extensions.ECPointExtensions.ToAffine(Eduard.Cryptography.TwistedEdwardsCurve,Eduard.Cryptography.ProjectivePoint)
member.summary: Convert a projective point to an affine point on the twisted Edwards curve.

member.name: M:Eduard.Cryptography.Extensions.ECPointExtensions.ToExtendedProjective(Eduard.Cryptography.TwistedEdwardsCurve,Eduard.Cryptography.ECPoint)
member.summary: Convert an affine point on the twisted Edwards curve to extended projective coordinates.

member.name: M:Eduard.Cryptography.Extensions.ECPointExtensions.ToExtendedProjective(Eduard.Cryptography.TwistedEdwardsCurve,Eduard.Cryptography.ProjectivePoint)
member.summary: Convert a point from homogeneous projective coordinates to extended projective coordinates on the twisted Edwards curve.

member.name: M:Eduard.Cryptography.Extensions.ECPointExtensions.GetPointCopy(Eduard.Cryptography.TwistedEdwardsCurve,Eduard.Cryptography.ProjectivePoint)
member.summary: Convert a point from homogeneous to extended projective coordinates on the twisted Edwards curve.

member.name: M:Eduard.Cryptography.Extensions.ECPointExtensions.ToProjective(Eduard.Cryptography.TwistedEdwardsCurve,Eduard.Cryptography.ECPoint)
member.summary: Convert an affine point on the twisted Edwards curve to homogeneous projective coordinates.

member.name: M:Eduard.Cryptography.Extensions.ECPointExtensions.ToProjective(Eduard.Cryptography.TwistedEdwardsCurve,Eduard.Cryptography.ExtendedProjectivePoint)
member.summary: Convert a point from extended to homogeneous projective coordinates on the twisted Edwards curve.

member.name: M:Eduard.Cryptography.Extensions.ECPointExtensions.ToJacobian(Eduard.Cryptography.EllipticCurve,Eduard.Cryptography.ECPoint)
member.summary: Convert an affine point on the elliptic curve to Jacobian projective form.

member.summary: Convert a given point in modified Jacobian projective coordinates into a Jacobian projective point on the elliptic curve.

member.summary: Convert a given point in extended Jacobian-Chudnovsky projective coordinates into a Jacobian projective point on the elliptic curve.

member.summary: Convert a given point in extended Jacobian-Chudnovsky projective coordinates into an affine point on the elliptic curve.

member.name: M:Eduard.Cryptography.Extensions.ECPointExtensions.ToJacobianChudnovsky(Eduard.Cryptography.EllipticCurve,Eduard.Cryptography.ECPoint)
member.summary: Convert an affine point on the elliptic curve to the extended Jacobian-Chudnovsky projective form.

member.name: M:Eduard.Cryptography.Extensions.ECPointExtensions.ToAffine(Eduard.Cryptography.EllipticCurve,Eduard.Cryptography.ModifiedJacobianPoint)
member.summary: Convert a given point in modified Jacobian projective coordinates into an affine point on the elliptic curve.

member.summary: Convert an affine point on the elliptic curve into a given point in modified Jacobian projective coordinates.

member.summary: Convert a point from Jacobian-Chudnovsky form on the elliptic curve into a given point in modified Jacobian projective coordinates.

member.summary: Convert a point from Jacobian form on the elliptic curve into a given point in modified Jacobian projective coordinates.

member.name: T:Eduard.Cryptography.Extensions.EllipticCurveExtensions
member.summary: This class provides utilities to convert elliptic curves between families and map points to an isomorphic curve via isogenies.

member.summary: Convert a Montgomery curve to the equivalent twisted Edwards curve.

member.name: M:Eduard.Cryptography.Extensions.EllipticCurveExtensions.ToMontgomeryCurve(Eduard.Cryptography.TwistedEdwardsCurve)
member.summary: Convert a twisted Edwards curve to the equivalent Montgomery curve.

member.summary: Convert an affine point on a twisted Edwards curve to the equivalent affine point on the Montgomery curve.

member.name: T:Eduard.Cryptography.Extensions.PointEncodingExtensions
member.summary: This class provides methods to compress and decompress affine points on the elliptic curve, needed for elliptic curvebased protocols.

member.summary: Compresses an affine point on the Weierstrass curve into a byte array.

member.summary: Compresses an affine point on the twisted Edwards curve into a byte array.

member.summary: Decompresses a byte array into an affine point on the twisted Edwards curve.

member.summary: Decompresses a byte array into an affine point on the Weierstrass curve.

member.name: T:Eduard.Cryptography.JacobianChudnovskyPoint
member.summary: Represents a Jacobian-Chudnovsky projective point (X, Y, Z, Z^2, Z^3) that maps to the affine elliptic curve point (X/Z^2, Y/Z^3).

member.summary: Creates a equal to the point at infinity.

member.name: T:Eduard.Cryptography.WindowUtil
member.summary: Provides optimal features for the use of sliding windows and fractional sliding windows with NAF representation.

member.name: M:Eduard.Cryptography.WindowUtil.Window(Eduard.BigInteger,System.Int32,System.Int32@,System.Int32@,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the value of the sliding window with a maximum size in bits given by the parameter size.
member.param: Represents the exponent that is partitioned using the sliding window.
Represents the i-th bit where the partitioning of exponent x begins.
Represents the number of processed bits.
Represents the number of additional trailing zeros detected.
Represents the sliding window maximum size.

member.name: M:Eduard.Cryptography.WindowUtil.NAFWindow(Eduard.BigInteger,Eduard.BigInteger,System.Int32,System.Int32@,System.Int32@,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the sliding window value, using fractional windows.
member.param: Represents the exponent that is partitioned using the fractional sliding window.
The parameter x3 represents the triple of the exponent x, that is, x3 = 3*x.
Represents the i-th bit where the partitioning of exponent x begins.
Represents the number of processed bits.
Represents the number of additional trailing zeros detected.
Represents the fractional sliding window maximum size.
